datum: The Lord said * to my Lord: sit at my right hand.
Faithful * are all of your commands: confirmed for ever and ever.
Your commands * I have greatly desired.
May the name of the Lord * be blessed forever.
We who live, * bless the Lord.
Blessed be God, and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, + the Father of mercies, and God of all consolation, * who consoles us in all our tribulation.
